Uptrain Training Setup

HI aswinskumar,

You need to complete this training project as part of the training process. This environment setup aims to provide a remote cloud environment that can be connected to your Visual Studio Code (VS Code) for working. The tasks involved include:

  • Download and install VS Code.
  • Generate SSH key for environment access.
  • Account creation - give generated SSH key for account creation and access.
  • Retrieve the access conf after account created.
  • Gain access to the training projects and clone the projects.
  • Set up composer.
  • Begin coding the projects.
  • Complete the project and submit it for review.
    •

            API URL: https://intern2.uptrain.co/api
